Uses of Class
org.apache.freemarker.servlet.jsp.TaglibFactory.MetaInfTldSource

  • Packages that use TaglibFactory.MetaInfTldSource 
    Package Description
    org.apache.freemarker.servlet
    Servlet for legacy "Model 2" frameworks that allows using FreeMarker templates instead of JSP as the MVC View (see in the Manual), also custom JSP tag support.
    org.apache.freemarker.servlet.jsp
    Allows JSP custom tags to be used inside FreeMarker templates as if they where FreeMarker directives.

    • Uses of TaglibFactory.MetaInfTldSource in org.apache.freemarker.servlet

      Methods in org.apache.freemarker.servlet that return types with arguments of type TaglibFactory.MetaInfTldSource 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected List<TaglibFactory.MetaInfTldSource> FreemarkerServlet.createDefaultMetaInfTldSources()
      Creates the default of the "MetaInfTldSources" init-param; if this init-param is specified, it will completelly replace the default value.

    • Uses of TaglibFactory.MetaInfTldSource in org.apache.freemarker.servlet.jsp

      Subclasses of TaglibFactory.MetaInfTldSource in org.apache.freemarker.servlet.jsp 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  TaglibFactory.ClasspathMetaInfTldSource
      To search TLD-s under META-INF/**/*.tld inside classpath root containers, that is, in directories and jar-s that are in the classpath (or are visible for the class loader otherwise).
      static class  TaglibFactory.ClearMetaInfTldSource
      When it occurs in the TaglibFactory.MetaInfTldSource list (TaglibFactory.getMetaInfTldSources()), all TaglibFactory.MetaInfTldSource-s before it will be disabled.
      static class  TaglibFactory.WebInfPerLibJarMetaInfTldSource
      To search TLD-s under sevletContext:/WEB-INF/lib/*.{jar,zip}/META-INF/**/*.tld, as requested by the JSP specification.
      Fields in org.apache.freemarker.servlet.jsp with type parameters of type TaglibFactory.MetaInfTldSource 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static List<? extends TaglibFactory.MetaInfTldSource> TaglibFactory.DEFAULT_META_INF_TLD_SOURCES
      The default of TaglibFactory.getMetaInfTldSources(); a list that contains TaglibFactory.WebInfPerLibJarMetaInfTldSource.INSTANCE, which gives the behavior described in the JSP 2.2 specification.
      Methods in org.apache.freemarker.servlet.jsp that return TaglibFactory.MetaInfTldSource 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static TaglibFactory.MetaInfTldSource TaglibFactory.parseMetaInfTldLocation(String value)
      Parse TLD location string value.
      Methods in org.apache.freemarker.servlet.jsp that return types with arguments of type TaglibFactory.MetaInfTldSource 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<? extends TaglibFactory.MetaInfTldSource> TaglibFactory.getMetaInfTldSources()
      See TaglibFactory.Builder.getMetaInfTldSources()
      List<? extends TaglibFactory.MetaInfTldSource> TaglibFactory.Builder.getMetaInfTldSources()
      Getter pair of TaglibFactory.Builder.setClasspathTlds(List)
      static List<TaglibFactory.MetaInfTldSource> TaglibFactory.parseMetaInfTldLocations(List<String> values)
      Parse each TLD location string in the list and return a list of type TaglibFactory.MetaInfTldSource.
      Method parameters in org.apache.freemarker.servlet.jsp with type arguments of type TaglibFactory.MetaInfTldSource 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TaglibFactory.Builder TaglibFactory.Builder.metaInfTldSources(List<? extends TaglibFactory.MetaInfTldSource> metaInfTldSources)
      Fluent API equivalent of TaglibFactory.Builder.setMetaInfTldSources(List).
      void TaglibFactory.Builder.setMetaInfTldSources(List<? extends TaglibFactory.MetaInfTldSource> metaInfTldSources)
      Sets the list of places where we will look for META-INF/**/*.tld files.
